title: India cenbank committee recommends AI framework for finance sector
description: The central bank established the committee in December to develop a Framework for Responsible and Ethical Enablement of Artificial Intelligence (FREEAI) for the finance sector
content:
The report contains 26 recommendations under six categories including infrastructure, capacity, policy, governance, protection and assurance. (Image: Reuters)

title: Judge sprays lawyers for filing error-riddled AI papers
description: Lawyers acting for a boy accused of murder used artificial intelligence to prepare their case and did not check before filing documents littered with mistakes.
content:
Rishi Nathwani KC did not check AI-created documents before they were filed, a court has been told. (Aap/AAP PHOTOS)

title: DeepSeek's launch of new AI model delayed by Huawei chip issues, FT reports
description: Chinese artificial intelligence company DeepSeek has delayed the release of its new model after failing to train it using Huawei's chips, highlighting the limits of Beijing's push to replace U.S. technology, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.
content:
A DeepSeek AI sign is seen at a building where the Chinese start-up's office is located in Beijing, China, February 19, 2025. REUTERS/Florence Lo/File Photo Purchase Licensing Rights , opens new tab

title: Illinois becomes third state to restrict use of AI in mental health industry as experts warn about 'AI psychosis'
description: Illinois passed a bill banning therapists from employing artificial intelligence chatbots for assistance with mental health therapy as experts countrywide warn against people's ever-growing reliance on the machines.
content:
Illinois passed a bill banning therapists from employing artificial intelligence chatbots for assistance with mental health therapy, as experts countrywide warn against people’s ever-growing reliance on the machines.

title: Generative AI set to improve banking operations in India by 46%: RBI Report
description: Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) has the potential to improve banking operations in India by up to 46 per cent, according to a report by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI).
content:
New Delhi [India], August 14 (ANI): Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) has the potential to improve banking operations in India by up to 46 per cent, according to a report by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI).

title: Google to Spend $9 Billion in Oklahoma to Expand AI, Cloud Infrastructure
description: Alphabet's Google said it will spend an additional $9 billion in Oklahoma over the next two years to expand cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
Alphabet's Google said on Wednesday it will spend an additional $9 billion in Oklahoma over the next two years to expand cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Xailient Showcases Privacy-Safe AI Solutions at the 2025 Australasian Gaming Expo
description: SYDNEY, Aug. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Xailient, the global leader in privacy-safe artificial intelligence for computer vision applications, announced today that it is presenting a groundbreaking safer gaming solution at the Australasian Gaming Expo (AGE), taking place 12-14 August 2025 at the ICC Sydney.

title: Apple's AI Comeback Plans Include Robots, Lifelike Siri
description: Apple Inc. is plotting its artificial intelligence comeback with an ambitious slate of new devices, including robots, a lifelike version of Siri, a smart speaker with a display and home-security cameras. title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns machines may outthink humans in years
description: Geoff Hinton warns artificial intelligence could surpass humans within years, not decades, and recommends a focus on creating maternal instincts in machines.
